kw.msg: Get LATEST chromedriver version for google-chrome

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Select From List By Label
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'xpath=//select[@id='userSelect']' by label Hermoine Granger.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
